postprocess

  • postprocess(displ: boolean, strain: boolean, stress: boolean, displName: String, strainName: String, stressName: String): void
    • Defined in src/lib/types.arch.ts:268
    brief

    Post process at all observation grids (Grid) after the model is solved.

    Parameters

    • displ: boolean

      True if displacement has to be computed

    • strain: boolean

      True if strain has to be computed

    • stress: boolean

      True if stress has to be computed

    • displName: String

      The name of the Displacement attribute

    • strainName: String

      The name of the strain attribute

    • stressName: String

      The name of the stress attribute

    Returns void

setOkadaConvention

  • setOkadaConvention(): void
    • Defined in src/lib/types.arch.ts:250
    brief

    Set the Okada Convention (default).

    • x axis is the normal of the triangle
    • y axis is along strike
    • z axis is dip (pointing upward on fault plane when normal is up)
    see

    setPoly3DConvention

    Returns void

setPoly3DConvention

  • setPoly3DConvention(): void
    • Defined in src/lib/types.arch.ts:239
    brief

    Set the Poly3D Convention

    • x is dip (pointing downward on fault plane when normal is up)
    • y is strike
    • z is normal
    see

    setOkadaConvention

    Returns void
